entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 1:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 11.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 9.7°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
